articles.title: Reports: Loftus-Cheek set for surgery with season-ending injury feared – Corvi’s gesture

articles.title: Milan, it's tough now. Chaos and bad luck, and Inter runs away

articles.title: Parma beats Milan. CorSport: "They still play for Chivu"
articles.summary: Very bitter evening for Milan, who lost 1-0 against Parma. Today's edition of Corriere dello Sport talks about it, which ironically writes: "They still play for Chivu".

articles.title: The Devil is knocked out. La Gazzetta: "Milan stop, Scudetto far away"
articles.summary: Bad Sunday for Milan, who lost 1-0 at home against Parma and moved further away from Inter, now at +10.

articles.title: CorSera opens: "Milan also stops. And Inter flies to plus ten"
articles.summary: An indigestible Sunday for Milan, who lost 1-0 at San Siro against Parma. On what was supposed to be the day of redemption after the draw against Como, the Rossoneri are unable to get back up and fall badly against Carlos Cuesta's boys.

articles.title: Heavy knockout against Parma. The QS on the front page: "Milan slows down, the derby remains"
articles.summary: Very bad defeat for Milan, who lost 1-0 at San Siro against Parma and moved further away from the top of the table. Christian Chivu's Inter are now 10 points behind.

articles.title: Bitter Sunday for the Devil. Tuttosport opening: "Ouch Milan, Cuesta hurts"
articles.summary: It should have been the evening of redemption after the controversial draw against Como, but instead Milan experienced another nightmare afternoon losing 1-0 against Parma.

articles.title: CorSport opens: "Milan, gift to Inter"
articles.summary: A very bitter Sunday for Milan, who lost 1-0 at San Siro against Parma and saw Inter go +10 in the standings. Corriere dello Sport, in today's edition of the newspaper, has the headline: "Milan, gift to Inter".

articles.title: La Gazzetta on the front page: "Ira Milan. Inter +10"
articles.summary: After the home draw against Como, Milan did not recover, on the contrary: they lost 1-0 against Parma and moved further away from Inter. They are now 10 points away from the Nerazzurri.

articles.summary: (ANSA) - ROME, FEBRUARY 22 - After the draw against Como in injury time, Milan lose after 24 days, beaten 1-0 by Parma at San Siro. Balanced first half with a couple of chances for Pulisic.
